extendedInfo.description: !!IMPORTANT if you would like to run Analytix on your Honeycomb tablet, choose Analytix HD instead. This is optimized for Honeycomb tablets!Analytix is an application for visualizing Google Analytics data near real-time(hourly view!!!) and is serving great and clean visualizations. I've been working with some of the best SEO experts to create a nice compilation of the most used features and most wanted data. Analytix will visualize the following Google Analytics  data:1. Visits per date(year/month/week/day/hour via slider)2. Top referring pages3. Visits by country4. Previous and next page5. Search engines6. Pageviews7. Top keywords8. Top landing pages9. Top problematic pages10. Top browsers11. System information12. Network information13. Mobile traffic14. Visitor based conversion rate15. Revenues by date(year/month/week/day/hour via slider)16. Total revenues by type17. Social revenues18. Social pageviews19. Application pageviews(for android developers)20. Application events(for android developers)21. Adwords clicks and impressions22. Adwords matched query23. Total events24. Event categories25. Event actions26. Event labels27. Google Pagespeed28. Pageload timeAnalytics will visualize Google Analytics data with  advanced graphics and charts. Compare today's results with yesterday or last week within 2 clicks!In the preference screen you can define:1. start-date2. end-date(optional), today is default as end-date3. number of results4. which tabs should be visible5. remove stored dataFeel free to contact me for requests and/or bugs/errors. This application is optimized for mdpi and hdpi devices and tested on several devices. If it doesn't work on your device please let me know!For updates, follow Analytix on Twitter:http://twitter.com/AndroidAnalytix

reviews.title: Odd stats
reviews.comment: I\'ve got two websites - A and B. Website A\'s analytics say I got 50 referrals from B today. When I check site B\'s analytics it says I only had a 10 hits today, nowhere near enough for 50 people to click through to A. Something\'s wrong.
reviews.author: Olly Pohlmann

reviews.title: Can\'t invalidate
reviews.comment: Reported 2 bugs in 3 days, and they were fixed immiedlety! If something don\'t work just write to the author. Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ok
reviews.comment: why do \"sources\" show in the widget but not in the app? you should be able to customize a dashboard by selecting widgets.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried lots of different analytic tools and this is the best. Simple but yet contains everything you\'ll need. Absolutely worth the money. The widget is also great and very flexible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app. Has one major bug
reviews.comment: Has a bug which for me is a major one. It doesn\'t calculate the year stats. When clicked on year it only calculates the last 2 months. Will re-rate it when fixed. Much better than the previous version though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Far more complete than the official app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than Google\'s own apply!
reviews.comment: This presents your Analytics stats in a simple useful and attractive way. Simple to use, with nice widgets. Well worth buying.
reviews.author: Philip Storry

reviews.title: Best analytics app out there but not perfect
reviews.comment: Let\'s face it, there are no good Google Analytics apps available on Android. This one is the best but still a bit lacking. In order to get to any chart I need to go through at least three screens. There is no way to pin a certain profile or chart to the home page of this app. Besides that you can\'t set a date range.  On the pro this app shows a lot of views and you can customize what you get to see which is neat.
reviews.author: Bart Claeys

reviews.title: pls widget support for nexus 7
reviews.comment: very nice app but I would like support for widgets on my Nexus 7.
reviews.author: florian ciorica

reviews.title: Oustanding
reviews.comment: Now works great on my Galaxy Nexus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Dashboard
reviews.comment: There are different analytics apps that offer different features that are useful, depending on your preference for viewing data. Personally I use 3 apps. Some are more complicated than they need to be. For this one, I like the clear snapshot it provides without having to dig into a ton of settings. Let\'s you see a nice breakdown of everything at a glance, very clean and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stop working
reviews.comment: Last few weeks this apps stop working. No data available when open.
reviews.author: Pava Pava

reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.comment: After the devastating recent update of gAnalytics, I had to look for an alternative. Gladly I found this app. On my still beloved HD2, it does everything I need for the price of a cup of coffee.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wrong data
reviews.comment: Fix this we pay for this app but give us wrong data. Try to compare analytics and your app it gives different data
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs update
reviews.comment: It\'s been a great app for a while until it started crashing on opening consistently. I\'m running it on a RAZR M.
reviews.author: Fabio Basile

reviews.title: Nice UI
reviews.comment: Best analytics app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: broken
reviews.comment: won\'t show my accounts in a list, yet when I try to log in, it says I am already logged in.  when I click the \"No Data\" button, it tells me I should select from the list of accounts.  absolutely worthless.
reviews.author: Stephen Rowe

reviews.title: Google 2 Factor Authentication
reviews.comment: If you wish to use 2 Factor Authentication then make sure to clear all data for this app from the android apps settings
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superb ux
reviews.comment: Love the app, worth much more
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: App isn\'t working.  It provides instructions to obtain a new access token but it only takes you in circles.  Company has not responded to my msg.
reviews.author: A Google User
